author: gregames
msg: merge totally reversed ranges like 4-5,1-2 into 1-5
if (not(end is bad || start is good)) { merge }
ORing the bad condition with the good doesn't produce the desired result.
it is not necessary to test "end" due to the conditions tested in the assert.

author: covener
msg: test some arbitrary ranges that should be merged and sent multipart for regression.

msg: Added a couple of unit tests for AXIOM-270 and fixed the issue described in AXIOM-203.
